item.title: CVE-2024-37460|2024-07-21T21:36:43.090Z -- supersaas -- supersaas%20%E2%80%93%20online%20appointment%20scheduling
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SuperSaaS SuperSaaS – online appointment scheduling allows Stored XSS.This issue affects SuperSaaS – online appointment scheduling: from n/a through 2.1.9.
